name: CelV Run
description:
CelV Run is the ultimate multiplayer 1v1 race while the floor is lava. In CelV Run you can challenge any of your friends, or you can challenge a player from anywhere in the world. To win, just don't fall into the lava and pass through the platforms as quickly as possible. Fight for the best position in the global LeaderBoard, with 13 possible ranks to reach.

-Each match is a 1v1 match against another player
-With 13 possible ranks to reach
-Global LearderBoard
-A lobby with up to 8 people
